body: Hi Mostapha & everyone, I am exploring form finding for "environmental performance" (excluding structurla at this phase)  using as a reference your paper "**BUILDING SIMULATION AND EVOLUTIONARY OPTIMIZATION IN THE CONCEPTUAL DESIGN OF A HIGH-PERFORMANCE OFFICE BUILDING**". I want to be able to have 3D results of generations as in your : video [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fYw7KexxThM](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fYw7KexxThM) Is it possible to do it without Matlab? and how would the workflow be? Thanks for any insight, Nita [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Ltz8IQUQkiIkqYQPheVRxtHT*7Wn9stMEN94szrTMU7gtVDq3HU9l11pFJfuZD8w5uVEyGRU1Ejl9v9ovM00YlvJ2TDAAvdd/formoptimization.jpg)
topic: Baking geometry results after optimization with Octopus
